component.name: Bluetooth Bitrate Manager
component.summary: Monitor and manage PipeWire Bluetooth audio codecs

description.p: Bluetooth Bitrate Manager is a GTK4 application that monitors and manages PipeWire Bluetooth audio codecs with real-time bitrate information.

ul.li: Monitor active Bluetooth audio codec and bitrate in real-time
Support for SBC, AAC, aptX, LDAC, and LC3 codecs
Optional high-bitpool SBC rebuild for improved audio quality
Command-line interface for scripting and automation
Modern GTK4 and libadwaita interface
Seamless PipeWire integration
